entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Montréal
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:22 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Trudeau Int'l Airport 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -1.7°C

Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: ENE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:
